footer_main_message: is a project aimed on creating free tools to help OSInt operations involving phone number investigations.
footer_open_source_message: we are an open source project.
footer_need_a_feature_a: Inform us on GitHub and maybe we will implement it!
header_message: Generate Google searches for the phone number:
meta_cmb_prefix_no_prefix_qm: Combined query: No prefix; Quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_standard_qm: Combined query: Standard prefix; Quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_plus_qm: Combined query: Prefix with plus; Quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_zeros_qm: Combined query: Prefix with zeros; Quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_no_prefix_noqm: Combined query: No prefix; No quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_standard_noqm: Combined query: Standard prefix; No quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_plus_noqm: Combined query: Prefix with plus; No quotation marks
meta_cmb_prefix_zeros_noqm: Combined query: Prefix with zeros; No quotation marks
feedback_message_invalid_number: This input does not seem to be a valid phone number.
